name: Pong (itch) (GioSivo)
description:
This was the first project I made. Simply, it's pong made to look like it's on an old television. While it may not be original, this was my first project and I'm proud of it.

Both players are controlled manually. W and S for player 1. Up and Down for player 2.

The game is endless and can be exited by alt-f4.
